thread.title: The 10 Best Sneaker Photos on Instagram This Week
thread.title_full: The 10 Best Sneaker Photos on Instagram This Week

author: Pete Williams
title: The 10 Best Sneaker Photos on Instagram This Week
text:
Another week and we’re back with the highlights from our series showcasing some of the best sneaker photos we come across on Instagram each week. By now the “floating” kicks or shoes dangling off a building looks are commonplace, but when done well they’re still worth a look.
Whether it’s a glimpse at the latest hype release, something super rare or simply a stunning shot of a more common pair, we’re looking to bring you look into how the creative community captures their favorite footwear, as well highlighting some of Instagram’s biggest sneakerheads.
Without further ado here are 10 of the best sneakers photos of the week.
• Blacked Out #PureBoost 
A post shared by Santino LoConte (@santinoloconte) on Mar 5, 2017 at 5:38pm PST 

Sneaker style diversity ☺️. The Miami weekend rotation. 
A post shared by ldn2hk (@ldn2hk) on Mar 6, 2017 at 7:07am PST 

tiiisc 
A post shared by TQ (@kickstq) on Mar 6, 2017 at 7:11am PST 


New all white #Nike Flyknit Racers vs Triple white #Adidas Ultraboost 2.0s 🤔 
A post shared by Johnny (@paid2shoot) on Mar 5, 2017 at 3:43pm PST 

first March pickup – @adidasy3 Pureboost – all I see is unboxings of these – anybody actually wearing..? 🌚. 
A post shared by 杜哲伟 | Lutz Du (@inmidoutsole) on Mar 5, 2017 at 11:31am PST 

💧💧💧💧 @highsnobiety @hypebeast @praise_mag @mobilesneakers @blvckxculture #nikeairforce #nikeairforce1#af1gallery #snkrempire #sneakerfreak #sneakersaddict #sneakershouts #nicekicks #sneakerholics #basementapproved #mobilesneakers #peigworldwide #complexsneakers #sneakerhead #minimalmovement #snobshots #dashape #crepecity #blkvis #hichemog #hypedstreets #menwithfootwear #modernnotoriety #blvckxculture #getswooshed 
A post shared by CK (@c__k_) on Mar 4, 2017 at 12:48am PST 

AJ1 🌈 
A post shared by benjjii (@benjjii) on Mar 6, 2017 at 2:52am PST 

May the bridges I burn light the way. 
A post shared by David Wallace (@davidwallaceshoots) on Mar 7, 2017 at 1:36am PST 

👀💎 📷 @kovkou #vans #vansczsk #strictlyvans #strictlywaffles #dnesobuvam #sneakeraddict #hskicks #sadp #kotd #underthepalms 
A post shared by Tomas Velicky (@tomshvel) on Mar 6, 2017 at 9:01am PST 

it's raining pixels. ☂️ 
A post shared by Johannes Hoehn @germanroamers (@pangea) on Mar 7, 2017 at 7:11am PST
